hints.content:
First, we need to find $22$ cm on the number line.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f1788be8025d402a180231a9add7a70486beb59c)

Each dot represents one doll. 

So, we need to count all of the dots on the line plot that represent lengths longer than $22$ cm.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2dc86387dbc2004a3b22ec2a5ad010e9d6b06c68)

There are $\blueE5$ dots that represent lengths longer than $22$ cm.   

$\blueE5$ dolls are longer than $22$ cm.

question.content:
The heights of Sabrina's dolls are shown below.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/255f1f36c184974802873845262cd22a54f2405c)

**How many dolls are taller than $22$ centimeters?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] dolls
